definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: burst forth (cf. Nö:ZMG 1883, 538; NH id., Aram. id., and goh.; Eth. goh.a: break forth, of light, etc.)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יׇגִיחַ]] Job 40:23, ms. [[וַתָּ֫גַח]] Ez Eze 32:2; Imv. fs. [[גּׁ֫חִי]] Mic 4:10; Inf. sf. [[גִיחו]]([[בְּ]]) Job 38:8; Pt. sf. [[גּׁחִ֫י]] Ps 22:10 (but cf. infr.);—
intrans. burst forth, of dashing river (a very Jordan) Job 40:23; of sea fig. as babe from womb Job 38:8, cf.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: draw forth from womb (subj. ´[[י]]) Ps 22:10 (where rd. [[גׇּחִ֫י]] pt. fr. [[גּוּחַ]], or regard [[גּׁחִי]] as metapl., as if fr. [[גחךְ]]…? v. De & Che:crit. note) cf. Ps 71:6; also

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: thrust forth, bring forth, fig. of travail, applied to Jerusalem in distress Mic 4:10 (cf. Sta:§ 599 b Kö:i. 505); burst forth with rivers (fig. of Pharaoh under image of [[תַּנִּים]]) Ez Eze 32:2, but for [[בנהרותיך]] (rivers) rd. prob. [[בִּנְחִרוֹתֶיךָ]] Job 41:12 (nostrils), i.e. snort with thy nostrils, so Ew Co; on fig. then cf. Job 41:11–Job 41:13.
